title: The Night Circus
author: Erin Morgenstern
description: A mysterious circus that only opens at night and two magicians bound by a magical duel.

title: Project Hail Mary
author: Andy Weir
description: A scientist wakes up alone in space with a mission to save Earth.

title: The House in the Cerulean Sea
author: TJ Klune
description: A caseworker evaluates an orphanage with magical children and discovers family in unexpected places.

title: The Midnight Library
author: Matt Haig
description: A woman finds herself in a library between life and death, able to explore the lives she could have lived.

title: Circe
author: Madeline Miller
description: A retelling of the myth of Circe, the enchantress from Homer's Odyssey.

title: The Silent Patient
author: Alex Michaelides
description: A psychological thriller about a woman who stops speaking after a shocking crime.

title: Mexican Gothic
author: Silvia Moreno-Garcia
description: A horror novel set in a mysterious mansion in the Mexican countryside.

title: The Paper Palace
author: Miranda Cowley Heller
description: A woman confronts a life-changing decision over the course of a summer weekend.

title: Tomorrow, and Tomorrow, and Tomorrow
author: Gabrielle Zevin
description: A story about friendship, love, and video game development.

title: Remarkably Bright Creatures
author: Shelby Van Pelt
description: A heartwarming novel about an unlikely friendship between a woman and an octopus.

title: Klara and the Sun
author: Kazuo Ishiguro
description: An AI-powered companion observes human emotions and longing.

title: The Atlas Six
author: Olivie Blake
description: A dark academia fantasy about six talented magicians competing for a secret society.

title: Lessons in Chemistry
author: Bonnie Garmus
description: A witty novel about a woman scientist who becomes an unexpected TV cooking show star.

title: Fourth Wing
author: Rebecca Yarros
description: A young woman is forced into an elite dragon-riding school where survival is uncertain.

title: Babel
author: R.F. Kuang
description: A dark academia novel exploring language, colonialism, and rebellion in 19th-century Oxford.

title: Before We Were Strangers
author: Renée Carlino
description: A second-chance romance about two lovers who reconnect after years apart.

title: Anxious People
author: Fredrik Backman
description: A group of strangers become unlikely allies after a failed bank robbery turns into a hostage situation.

title: The Guncle
author: Steven Rowley
description: A former sitcom star becomes the guardian of his niece and nephew, learning about love and family.

title: Sea of Tranquility
author: Emily St. John Mandel
description: A sci-fi novel spanning centuries, exploring time travel and existential questions.

title: The Book Thief
author: Markus Zusak
description: A story of a young girl in Nazi Germany, narrated by Death itself.

title: The Storied Life of A.J. Fikry
author: Gabrielle Zevin
description: A lonely bookstore owner finds a new purpose after an unexpected arrival.

title: The Henna Artist
author: Alka Joshi
description: A historical novel about a young woman in 1950s India escaping an arranged marriage to become a henna artist.

title: Verity
author: Colleen Hoover
description: A chilling romantic thriller about a ghostwriter uncovering disturbing secrets.

title: The Shadow of the Wind
author: Carlos Ruiz Zafón
description: A literary mystery set in post-war Barcelona, revolving around a forgotten book.

title: Pineapple Street
author: Jenny Jackson
description: A social satire about wealth, privilege, and family drama in Brooklyn.

title: The Measure
author: Nikki Erlick
description: A novel where everyone in the world receives a box predicting how long they will live.

title: Mad Honey
author: Jodi Picoult & Jennifer Finney Boylan
description: A novel about secrets, identity, and a courtroom drama surrounding a tragic death.

title: The Light We Lost
author: Jill Santopolo
description: A love story about fate and choices that shape a couple’s relationship over years.
